name: Saber the Swordfish
description:
Description

Saber the Swordfish is a short 5 minute game made for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Shivers 2021 game jam. It was created in roughly three weeks. The style is aimed towards all 5th generation consoles instead of one particular console.

Find and collect all the golden seahorses to win!

CONTROLS

*Controller is highly recommended

LOOK/AIMWASD/LEFT JOYSTICKMOVELEFT MOUSE/ A ON XBOX CONTROLLERSLOW DOWNHOLD RIGHT MOUSE/ R1/R2 - (WHILE MOVING)RE-CENTER SABERR KEY/D-PAD UPMENUESC/START

Feel free to tweet me your best run times : @MothInteractive
